attributes.action: cap the interest rate that can be charged by loan companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There can be no justification for loan companies charging more than 50% in interest for loans. As for certain companies charging 177% this is an outrage (provident).
When unexpected circumstances present themselves, it is the people who are already in trouble and cannot afford it who have no choice but to accept these rates, or those who are not financialy savvy enough to comprehend what they are letting themselves in for. 
Other European countries have operated interest rate caps of 20% (Germany) for the last 20 years succesfully with obvious benfits to the consumer.
